documentation.text:
@title Bridge
 
 @notice A bridge for DEX operations. Implements IBridge interface
@notice A global burn nonce. Its first value should be 1, not 0
@notice Amount of user addresses, which at least once executed 'mint' function
@notice Contains all the user addresses, which at least once executed 'mint' function
@notice Contains a burn nonce attached to the user address

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Provided nonce must be 1 greater than the previous burn nonce."

arguments.value: Provided nonce must be 1 greater than the previous burn nonce.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Provided nonce must be 1 greater than the previous burn nonce."

documentation.text: @notice A function, which is used to reset all the mint nonces.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Bridge: transfer into burn pool failed"

arguments.value: Bridge: transfer into burn pool failed

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Bridge: transfer into burn pool failed"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Bridge: transfer out of pool failed"

arguments.value: Bridge: transfer out of pool failed

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Bridge: transfer out of pool failed"

params.to_: The address used for mint function calls

returns._0: uint256 The nonce used during burn function calls

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getUserNonceMinted(address).notice: A function, which returns mint nonce for a specified ethereum address

resetUserNonceMinted().notice: A function, which is used to reset all the mint nonces.

userNonceMinted(address).notice: Contains a burn nonce attached to the user address

userdoc.notice: A bridge for DEX operations. Implements IBridge interface
